headline: QR Code Payment Market Trends Analysis Report 2025-2033, with Profiles of PaymentCloud, Clover Network, Revolut, Nearex, ACI, Ecentric Payment Systems, Block, UnionPay, LINE Pay, and PayPal
summary: The global QR Code Payment Market is projected to reach USD 61.73 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 20% from 2025 to 2033. Growth is driven by rising smartphone use and demand for contactless payments. The Asia Pacific leads this market surge.
